item.title: Installing Kubeflow On Ubuntu
item.description: In 2017, I built this deep learning machine as a solution to my growing AWS bill. In 2020, I struggled to get this machine to run Kubeflow locally. Here are the instructions that worked for me. Turn On Virtualization On AMD Chipset In BIOS, go to: M.I.T. Advanced Frequency Settings Advanced CPU Core Settings Set SVM Mode to Enabled Install MicroK8s MicroK8s is a small version of Kubernetes that will work well locally.
